member.name: P:GroupDocs.Viewer.Converter.Options.CellsOptions.OnePagePerSheet
member.summary:
Specifies worksheet rendering mode. When OnePagePerSheet is set to true all worksheet content is rendered into single html document. When OnePagePerSheet is set to false than worksheet content is divided into pages where each page includes count of rows defined in CountRowsPerPage option.
Default value is true.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Viewer.Converter.Options.CellsOptions.ShowHiddenSheets
member.summary: Indicates whether to show representations for hidden sheets. The default value is false.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Viewer.Converter.Options.CellsOptions.InternalHyperlinkPrefix
member.summary: Prefix for hyperlink that references worksheet inside the same document

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Viewer.Converter.Options.CellsOptions.CountRowsPerPage
member.summary:
The count rows to render into one html page when OnePagePerSheet is set to false.
Default value is 50.

member.name: M:GroupDocs.Viewer.Converter.Options.PdfOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Viewer.Converter.Options.PdfOptions.PreventGlyphsGrouping
member.summary: Indicates whether the mode when text glyphs will not be grouped into words and strings is on. The default value is false.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Viewer.Converter.Options.PdfOptions.UseOriginalContentOrdering
member.summary:
Specifies content ordering mode for resultant html document. When UseOriginalContentOrdering is set to true text and graphics are added to resultant html document according to z-order in original pdf document. This mode is preferable for rendering pdf documents with multilayered layout. When UseOriginalContentOrdering is set to false text and graphics are added as single layer to resultand html document.
The default value is false.

member.name: P:GroupDocs.Viewer.Config.ViewerConfig.LocalesPath
member.summary: Gets or sets path to locales.
member.remarks: LocalesPath is a path to the directory, containing xml files with localized strings. Files inside this directory should have following naming convention: "LocalizedStrings-{Language Culture Name}.xml" where {Language Culture Name} is your culture name e.g. "fr-FR". To learn more press here.

member.summary: Represents a container for localization messages templates.

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Viewer.Localization.LocalizedStringKeys.EXC_TMPL_CORRUPTED_OR_DAMAGED_FILE
member.summary: Corrupted or damaged file exception template. Default template is "Could not load file '{0}'. File is corrupted or damaged.", the {0} parameter is replaced by file GUID.

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Viewer.Localization.LocalizedStringKeys.EXC_TMPL_FILE_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED
member.summary: File type not suppported exception tempalte. Default template is "File type '{0}' is not supported.", the {0} parameter is replaced by file extension.

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Viewer.Localization.LocalizedStringKeys.EXC_TMPL_INVALID_PASSWORD
member.summary: Invalid password exception template. Default template is "Unable to decrypt file '{0}'. Password is invalid.", the {0} parameter is replaced by file GUID.

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Viewer.Localization.LocalizedStringKeys.EXC_TMPL_PASSWORD_PROTECTED_FILE
member.summary: The password protected file exception template. Default template is "Unable to opent encrypted file '{0}'. Please provide passwrod.", the {0} parameter is replaced by file GUID.

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Viewer.Localization.LocalizedStringKeys.EXC_TMPL_STORAGE_PATH_NOT_SPECIFIED
member.summary: Storage path not specified exception message. Default message is "The storage path is not specified. Please provide storage path.".

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Viewer.Localization.LocalizedStringKeys.EXC_TMPL_CACHE_FILE_NOT_FOUND
member.summary: Cache file not found exception template. Default template is "Could not find cached file '{0}'.", the {0} parameter is replaced by file path that was not found.

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Viewer.Localization.LocalizedStringKeys.EXC_TMPL_GUID_NOT_SPECIFIED
member.summary: GUID not specified exception message. Default message is "The file GUID is not specified. Please provide file GUID.".

member.name: F:GroupDocs.Viewer.Localization.LocalizedStringKeys.EXC_TMPL_TRANSFORMATION_FAILED_PAGE_NOT_EXIST
member.summary: Transformation failed because provided page does not exsit exception template. Default template is "Unable to transform file '{0}'. Page number '{1}' does not exist.", the {0} is replaced by file GUID, the {1} is replaced by page number.
